name: Tenacious Net
summary: Escaping your nets is no simple task.
description:
Escaping your nets is no simple task. The Athletics DC to Force Open or Escape your nets increases from 16 to 18. After a creature you grabbed with a net Escapes or Forces Open the net, stray strands of the net cling to the creature, causing them to remain flat-footed until the beginning of their next turn.Traits

Grippli: Gripplis are a family of frog-like humanoids. Gripplis craft and use these weapons.
